model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
I met this guy at work who's wife is an athletic trainer, they asked me to pass their info on to you to discuss possible internships!
That would be great- thanks so much!   I have searched online a lot for internships but it is tricky in my field.  What do you do for a living in the medical field?
You are so welcome. I am retired now but I was a PA- physician assistant. Now I enjoy hanging out at the beach. With my knees the way they are the ocean water seems to make them feel better. So how much longer before you graduate?
I have another year- so this year is really important I get internships and start making connections in the field.   I love going to the beach too.  What happened with your knees that now cause you so much pain?

[MEMORY]
Related Evidences: (1) {'Related Topics': 'Networking and Connections', 'Related Summaries': 'Speaker A suggests networking opportunities and connections for Speaker B's goals.', 'Related Dialogues': '### Speaker A: I'll definitely let him know about you. Would you be okay with him reaching out to you directly? He's always excited to share his soccer knowledge. ### Speaker B: Oh man, that would be great, thank you! I really want to make the team so I need all the help I can get! ### Speaker A: Sounds good. Have your professors been pretty receptive to writing letter for you? ### Speaker B: For the internship? Yeah they've been great. I'm really lucky I've got cool profs this year. ### Speaker A: How's the internship hunt going? ### Speaker B: It's tough right now to be honest. Not enough internships for too many students. ### Speaker A: I am sorry to hear that. The job market should pick up soon. The good thing about being in the medical field is that there is always a need for more help! ### Speaker B: Sports medicine is so popular right now. All the young sports fans grown up I guess.  ### Speaker A: Well, keep confidence in yourself that you are the best of the best and will outshine the competition! ### Speaker B: I hope so. Everyone else has all these connections through family and stuff. Their dad knows someone, etc. Gotta beat that. ### Speaker A: Keep up the surfing and maybe you will make some connections that way. ### Speaker B: That's true. I've heard that a lot of doctors surf on breaks to get their minds clear. Good idea' }
```
